hymn.title: He Came Serving
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

layout.singingstanza: He came serv -- ing, (serv -- ing) He came serv -- ing, (serv -- ing) He came serv -- ing, not to be served, but to serve. Mark ten, for -- ty -- five, (for -- ty -- five) Mark ten, for -- ty -- five, (for -- ty -- five) Mark ten, for -- ty -- five, not to be served, but to serve. (He served!) And to give His life for all, Life for all, life for all; And to give His life for all, A ran -- som for us all. (He was al -- ways serv -- ing!)
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2012 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: He came serving, (serving) He came serving, (serving) He came serving, not to be served, but to serve.
Mark ten, forty-five, Mark ten, forty-five, Mark ten, forty-five, not to be served, but to serve. (He served!)
And to give His life for all, Life for all, life for all; And to give His life for all, A ransom for us all. (He was always serving!)
